default: Rumors reach the Clan that m_c died recently.

lost: Will {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} reach StarClan, even so far away? m_c isn't sure, but as {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/drift/drifts} away, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/hope/hopes} to see familiar starry fur on the other side.
other_clan: A patrol crosses paths with o_c_n warriors, who tell of the passing of m_c.
m_c was a respected part of o_c_n, and {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} death is a shock to all the surrounding Clans.
other_clan_exiled: Rumors reach the Clan that m_c, an exile from o_c_n, has died recently.
other_clan_lost: Rumors reach the Clan that m_c, reported missing from o_c_n, has died recently.
